text: aur jo kuchh khuda ne aur usake rasool ne unako ata pharamaaya tha agar ye log us par raazee rahate aur kahate ki khuda hamaare vaaste kaaphee hai (us vakt nahin to) anaqareeb hee khuda hamen apane phazal va karam se usaka rasool de hee dega ham to yaqeenan allaah hee kee taraph lau lagae baithe hain
